job_title: Yield Enhancement Electrical Failure Analysis Engineer
job_description:
• Applies SPC, FDC, and 8D methodology to process optimization, testing, creating, and modifying process related procedures, and disposition of lots to increase the tool availability and turns through systematic problem solving Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Chemical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Material Science, or Physics.
• However, other engineering or related fields may be considered Proficient in one or more scripting, programming and visualization tools: Python, Java, Tableau, Matlab, Microsoft Suite Completes all required safety training and conducts all work in accordance with safety policies and regulations Analyzes data using various application and engineering knowledge to make critical process decisions Hands-on experience in the field of data analytics, preferably with experience querying databases Leads in expertise of executing area operations to ensure throughput needs are accomplished Experience or knowledge of data collection, warehousing systems, and data cleansing In-depth understanding and working knowledge of SPC and Design of Experiments Strong time management, organization, prioritization and communication skills.
